column5: Had to get some stuff at the reserve yesterday and drove through pow wow grounds on way back and took couple of pics there and the boat launch at the Hudson Bay post.pretty awesome views.
John, Where is the Hudson Bay post on Eagle Lake ? Is it an operating post or is it named that as a Lodge operation? Take care, PjShorthorn
It's was a trading post PJ its just off Hwy 594 very close to Colegroves camp.
Do a Google search on it.interesting write up.
Is there anything there but a boat launch and possibly a old swing set? Is the boat launch operable?
Yup.old swing set and some new playground stuff.was a couple of trucks and trailers park there so must be useable
